column5: I’m glad to know it isn’t just me. I go and watch the football as much as my anxiety allows. Can you recommend any hobbies that might help?
I’m glad it’s not just me being “soft” as my mum says. It’s nice to know somebody else feels the same. I’m here for you 😞
You’re so brave for trying to tell them everything. Sending big hugs! You will get through this ❤️
